name: NURO_MD
description: ᴊᴀᴠᴀsᴄʀɪᴘᴛ ᴡʜᴀᴛsᴀᴘᴘ ʙᴏᴛ ᴄʀᴇᴀᴛᴇᴅ ʙʏ THARAKA⁴³²

ALIVE_IMG.description: URL for the bot's alive image

ALIVE_MSG.description: Message that will be sent when bot is alive

PREFIX.description: Bot command prefix (Do not use null prefix)

MODE.description: Bot operational mode: public, private, inbox, or group

AUTO_VOICE.description: Set to true for automatic voice replies

AUTO_REPLY.description: Set to true for automatic replies

AUTO_STICKER.description: Set to true for automatic sticker sending

AUTO_READ_STATUS.description: Set to true for automatic read receipt

ANTI_LINK.description: Set to true to automatically remove group links

ANTI_BAD.description: Set to true to automatically delete bad words in groups

FAKE_RECORDING.description: Set to true to fake recording functionality

AUTO_REACT.description: Set to true for automatic reactions from the bot

OWNER_REACT.description: Set to true for reactions from the bot's owner
